name: Demo Station
description:
Export from Figma to clickable HTML with images. Includes Gallery and Element Inspector


Export examples

Example 1, Example 2


Features

  • Upload to cloud hosting
  • Overlays
  • Gallery (map and grid modes)
  • Play mode (on a full screen)
  • Element Inspector (Developer handoff)
  • Show layout grid (currently single grid of "cols" type only)
  • Text search by frame name and text node content across all project


Curent limitations

The plugin doesn't run properly in Figma for Safari. Please use Chrome browser or Figma Desktop App.


Contacts

Send any feedback to mbazarov@gmail.com


More details

https://maxbazarov.github.io/demo-station-plugin
